content: this pattern to make your own crewmate from among us my instructions are organized and are very clear to understand the pdf pattern has 11 pages there are 15 photos to help you along skill level beginner finish size when using similar materials the doll will be 8 cm - 3 high and 5 5 cm 2 wide materials original yarn kid`s cotton 100% mercerized cotton 330m/361 yds per 100 g skein alternative yarn yarn art jeans ali̇ze cotton gold gazzal baby cotton any yarn with in approx yardage abbreviations all stitches are listed in us terms techniques used magic_ring single_crochet increasing in the next stitch decreases over the next two stitches sewing
